Player History
Drafted in 22nd round, 349th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/20/2015, off Val Chacko (KC)...
Injured on 5/19/2015 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 7/22/2015, off Gary Reith (HOU)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $591,429 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $591,429 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Chicago to St. Louis (C) on 7/25/2017 (Going to CHI: P Mario Romay. Going to STL: RF Jc Salomon)...
9/20/2017: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (C), $750,000 per year, for 2 years.
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Cincinnati on 6/25/2018 (Going to CIN: SS Clifford Brantner, RF Jc Salomon, P Ronald Diep. Going to STL: P Alfonso Rodriguez, CF Christopher Miller, P Bill Johnson)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Montreal on 3/2/2019 (Going to MON: RF Jc Salomon, P Isaac Baker, P Saul Trejo, P Kenneth Cram, P Lee Wyrick. Going to CIN: P Geronimo Larosa)...
